column4: When I used Windows, I enjoyed composing simple music using AnvilStudios (a midi sequencer.)  What is a good alternative to this application?  Is there an alternative to midi in the linux worId?  I tried seq24/jack/Zyn, but found that combo too complex and I could not figure out how to save the sequence to a midi file.
Rosegarden and Lillypad allow you to sequence and print MIDI music.
However, they aren't trivially easy to setu p. I couldn't figure it out. :-\
Thanks, I'll give it a try
